code: From Undecidability.Shared.Libs.DLW.Utils Require Import utils_list finite.
Definition fol_bin_sem b := match b with | fol_conj => and | fol_disj => or | fol_imp => fun A B => A -> B end.
Fact fol_bin_sem_ext b A A' B B' : (A <-> A') -> (B <-> B') -> (fol_bin_sem b A B <-> fol_bin_sem b A' B').
intros E1 E2; destruct b; simpl; tauto.
Fact fol_equiv_sem_ext A A' B B' : (A <-> A') -> (B <-> B') -> (A <-> B) <-> (A' <-> B').
Fact fol_equiv_ext (P Q : Prop) : P = Q -> P <-> Q.
Fact fol_equiv_impl A A' B B' : (A <-> A') -> (B <-> B') -> (A <-> B) -> (A' <-> B').
Fact fol_bin_sem_dec b A B : { A } + { ~ A } -> { B } + { ~ B } -> { fol_bin_sem b A B } + { ~ fol_bin_sem b A B }.
revert b; intros [] HA HB; simpl; tauto.
Fact fol_equiv_dec A B : { A } + { ~ A } -> { B } + { ~ B } -> { A <-> B } + { ~ (A <-> B) }.
Definition fol_quant_sem X q (P : X -> Prop) := match q with | fol_ex => ex P | fol_fa => forall x, P x end.
Fact fol_quant_sem_ext X q (P Q : X -> Prop) : (forall x, P x <-> Q x) -> fol_quant_sem q P <-> fol_quant_sem q Q.
split; intros (k & ?); exists k; apply H; auto.
split; intros ? k; apply H; auto.
Fact forall_list_sem_dec X (P : X -> Prop) (l : list X) : (forall x, { P x } + { ~ P x }) -> { forall x, In x l -> P x } + { ~ forall x, In x l -> P x }.
destruct list_dec with (P := fun x => ~ P x) (Q := P) (l := l) as [ (x & H1 & H2) | H1 ].
left; intros x; apply H1; auto.
Fact exists_list_sem_dec X (P : X -> Prop) (l : list X) : (forall x, { P x } + { ~ P x }) -> { exists x, In x l /\ P x } + { ~ exists x, In x l /\ P x }.
destruct list_dec with (P := P) (Q := fun x => ~ P x) (l := l) as [ (x & H1 & H2) | H1 ]; auto.
Fact fol_quant_sem_dec X q (P : X -> Prop) : finite_t X -> (forall x, { P x } + { ~ P x }) -> { fol_quant_sem q P } + { ~ fol_quant_sem q P }.
destruct exists_list_sem_dec with (l := lX) (1 := H); firstorder.
destruct forall_list_sem_dec with (l := lX) (1 := H); firstorder.
